query: UPDATE artist_info SET bio = REPLACE(bio, 'iterative creation. Ben typically originates', 'iterative creation.\n\nBen typically originates') WHERE id = 1;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user RXsnsHaxFXFzWXK.root --database TGNsMbsGdWXQhRmCtYbG6q --execute UPDATE artist_info SET bio = REPLACE(bio, 'iterative creation. Ben typically originates', 'iterative creation.\n\nBen typically originates') WHERE id = 1;
